front.title: Requirements for an IP VPN Policy Information Model

abstract.t: This document defines the requirements for a policy information model that should help service providers in dynamically provisioning IP Virtual Private Networks (VPN). From this perspective, this draft aims at identifying the basic capabilities that need to be supported by an IP VPN service offering and thus reflected in an IP VPN policy information model, so that IP VPN networks may be dynamically deployed according to the corresponding configuration information.
